thread.title: Fire rips through Waimarama Rd hillside in Hawke's Bay near Hastings
thread.title_full: Fire rips through Waimarama Rd hillside in Hawke's Bay near Hastings

title: Fire rips through Waimarama Rd hillside in Hawke's Bay near Hastings
text:
Fire rips through Waimarama Rd hillside in Hawke's Bay near Hastings Last updated 12:49, February 13 2017 TOMMY LIVINGSTON/FAIRFAX NZ 
A grass fire on the way to Waimarama Beach, Hawke's Bay. 
A grass fire has engulfed a hillside along the route to Hawke's Bay's popular Ocean and Waimarama beaches. 
Hastings Fire Service staff said about 18 tankers and fire trucks were called to the blaze on Waimarama Rd on Monday morning. The fire was believed to have spread to a neighbouring house. 
Do you have any photos or videos? Email Tommy Livingston 
A grass fire on the way to Waimarama Beach, Hawke's Bay. 
The cause of the fire was still unknown as crews continued to control flames. 
This blaze follows two serious fires in the region over the weekend and was the second grass fire for Monday. 
MORE SOON.
